body.p: This section lists the requirements for belt examines for the Aikido Schools of Useshiba (ASU) Aikido organization.

The ASU belt ranks start with kyu-level (white belt, starting with 6th Kyu and working up through 1st Kyu, and then progress to dan-level ranks (black belt), starting with Shodan (first-degree blank belt) and working up. Belt levels above Sandan (3rd-level black belt) are by acclamation.
